name: Fatlust
description:
Get together with your fat friend and get ready to crush him by eating more than him and shooting vomit.

Fatlust is a local 2-player game, with 3 different levels to crush your opponent.

Developed by 3D2 Entertainment for the Summer UE4 Jam.

Who are we??

We are 3D2 Entertainment. A studio based in Barcelona who wants to make itself known.

Dani Gálvez: Modeling & Interfaces

Xavi Amézqueta: Scripting

Robert Morancho: Level design

Manuel P. Perez: Music & FX

Danel Iriarte: Models & Animations

If you liked the game make it us know! :)
